answers.answer: I got my results within a few days. Ask the doctor and they'll let you know :)

I'm from Ireland but ive got friends in UK same as here if you have gestational diabetes then they will will call you if they dong call all is good but if you want to be sure you can ring after a week :)

question: hey I'm 27weeks tomorrow and having the glucose test just wondered how long until everyone got there results wether it was later that day or you gotta phone call a week later?!
title: Glucose test UK
